Present location: BIBLIOTHECA ALEXANDRINA ANTIQUETIES MUSEUM [01/027] ALEXANDRIA BAAM
Name: Flask of Saint Minas within Circular Ornament
Description: The flask of Saint Minas is decorated on both sides with a picture of the saint. Framed by two circles, between which is a round ornament, Saint Minas stands with two camels. They are sitting next to the saint with their heads down. The handles of the flask emerge from the neck and are attached to the shoulders.
